EmailTemplate.subject: You are Invited: Space Symposium 2017 Opening Night Celebration at Honeywell Booth #428
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Join Us on Opening Night at Space Symposium 2017
Honeywell Aerospace invites you to join us for complimentary drinks on the opening night of Space Symposium 2017 as we celebrate the kick-off to another great space industry event. Date: April 3, 2017 Time: 7:30 - 9 p.m. Location: Booth #428 Click here <[[http://space17.mapyourshow.com/7_0/floorplan/index.cfm?hallID=D&selectedBooth=booth~428]]> to see our location on the show floor. For more information or to schedule a meeting with Honeywell representatives at Space Symposium, contact Daryl Schuck, customer business manager at daryl.schuck@honeywell.com <[[mailto:daryl.schuck@honeywell.com]]> or 832-205-5990.
Delivering Mission Success: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow. Discover <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/markets/space]]> why Honeywell technology has been part of NASA’s manned space missions since 1958 and is on board 950 satellites and counting – all with 100% mission success.
Please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Email_OptIn_Space.html]]> if you like to stay informed about our upcoming events, product and service offerings.
